other_tests.findings: Cerebrospinal fluid showed predominantly lymphocytic pleocytosis; appearance clear and colorless. Findings included 28 red cells and 75 white cells, with a differential count showing 65% lymphocytes and 19% reactive lymphocytes.

other_tests.procedure_name: Multiple biopsies of the ethmoid sinus and other regions
other_tests.findings: Showed acute and chronic inflammation, necrosis, and hyphal elements; fungi identified as broad, pauciseptate hyphae consistent with mucormycosis.
